message.body: Happy Thanksgiving. And steph said she wants me to bring stuffing home so save us some
Now because grandma wants to go home
Ok then wait for me im on my way
Then never mind. ################. You knew I was coming over
I can.t wait when we deal with grandma she wants to eat and leave you can still come
Then why didn't you text me before you started. Im not rushing to get there so forget it
######## you said you was coming with your pie not coming for my dessert you always get mad did you forget I an dealing with an old lady
Do you want me to pick you up
Did you say you was a small or medium in thermal shirts
I think medium. Use your judgement if you are buying in store. Im not that wide.
If buying online need to fit bust size 36 I think
